name: ESTATE OF Regina GOLDBERG. Appeal of The COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO, LARSEN and FLAHERTY, JJ.
parties: ESTATE OF Regina GOLDBERG. Appeal of The COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed. Each side to pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Edward G. Biester, Jr., Atty. Gen., John M. Duff, Deputy Atty. Gen., Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Lester E. Zittrain, Crone & Zittrain, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
406 A.2d 749
ESTATE OF Regina GOLDBERG. Appeal of The COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 25, 1979.
Decided Oct. 23, 1979.
Edward G. Biester, Jr., Atty. Gen., John M. Duff, Deputy Atty. Gen., Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Lester E. Zittrain, Crone & Zittrain, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO, LARSEN and FLAHERTY, JJ.
